Published November 9 2014

President Obama's statement on net neutrality

President Obama's statement on net neutrality — Mr. Obama urged the FCC and chairman, Tom Wheeler, to reclassify the internet as a utility. A win for supporters of net neutrality, but ultimately could do little to sway the independently-run FCC.

Enjoy your day.
